item.title: Hajime no Ippo x Bayes: The importance of priors
item.description: Ippo fights Bayesian library(readr) Ippo_record <- read_csv("C:/Users/Alex Kirchner/Desktop/Work/G_PersonalWebsite/data/Ippo_fights_Bayesian.csv", col_types = cols(Date = col_date(format = "%m/%d/%Y"), Number = col_integer(), Record = col_character(), Result = col_factor(levels = c("WIN", "LOSS")), Type = col_factor(levels = c("TKO", "KO")))) Ippo_record <- Ippo_record[!is.na(Ippo_record$Number),] # Grid Approximation p_grid <- seq( from=0 , to=1 , length.out=1000 ) plot(p_grid, type = "line") ## Warning in plot.xy(xy, type, ...): plot type 'line' will be truncated to first ## character prob_p_unif_low <- ifelse(p_grid < 0.
